Translations.Text: “Nombe wanganyammwe nganim'ba mun'galagatile (Allah) jwangun'galagatila (kutendaga n'di mu ukafili pemo).”
“Nombe une soni nganimba nachigalagatile cham'bele n'di nkuchigalagatila wanganyammwe.”
“Nombe wanganyammwe nganim'ba mun'galagatile (Allah) jwangun'galagatila (kutendaga n'di mu ukafili pemo).”
“Jenumanja nkwete dini jenu (jagalagatila isanamu) une none ngwete dini jangu (jakun’galagatila Allah).”
Ndema jachiyiche chikulupusyo cha Allah ni kuwugula (Maaka kuwa m’makono mwa Asilamu)
Ni kwaona mmwejo wandu ali nkwinjila mu dini ja Allah mikutula-mikutula
Basi (jele ndemajo) luswejesyani lumbili lwa Ambuje wenu, ni kwawenda chikululuko. Chisimu Walakweo awele Wakupochela nnope toba
Gajonasiche makono ganagawili ga Abu Lahabi, nombe nao ajonasiche
Ngaija kwakamuchisya ipanje yao atamuno yawapanganyisye (mpela wanache wawaweleche)
Niwankwao wakwe wawaliji nkutwichila sasu (syamiwa nikuntejelaga Muhammadi ﷺ mwakupita)
Nnukosi mwao (wele wakongweo) chimukawe mwana litondolo lyamiwamiwa (lyakwalagachisya nalyo)
